subject: RE: [Admin] Payment Proposal - 29 The Ridge Road , Fingal VIC 3939 - ACCEPTED

full_threads.body:
Hi Ben,

Thanks for confirming.

We’ve updated the site, and I’ve also made the change to the syd-platform.
The last fix we did was for the CC pricing, so this should now work as expected moving forward.

Appreciate you flagging this.

Hi Joel,

Yes lets disable edits after the proposal is accepted - I thought this was already the case previously?

Regards,

Ben Rookes

Operations MANAGER



0456 553 848



03 9580 4102



brookes@novaricollective.com



Unit 74-76 Industrial Drive, Braeside VIC 3195



NOVARICOLLECTIVE.COM.AU







The content of this email is confidential and intended for the recipient specified only. It is strictly forbidden to share any part of this message with any third party without the sender's written consent. If you received this by mistake, please reply and delete it to avoid recurrence.

Hi Ben,

I hope you are doing well.

We are looking into this.
  • The client accepted the proposal for $15,364.00.
  • At the time of acceptance, it listed: MASTER BEDROOM 1 – Art Medium × 1.
  • After acceptance, it was updated to: MASTER BEDROOM 1 – Art Medium × 2.
Can I revert this back to 1 so it matches the accepted proposal?

We can also disable edits once a proposal is accepted to prevent changes after approval.

Let me know how you’d like to proceed.

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Joel Maligalig
